00028 #ifndef ABSTRACTCELLCENTREBASEDTISSUE_HPP_
00029 #define ABSTRACTCELLCENTREBASEDTISSUE_HPP_
00030 
00031 #include "AbstractTissue.hpp"
00032 
00037 template<unsigned DIM>
00038 class AbstractCellCentreBasedTissue : public AbstractTissue<DIM>
00039 {
00040 private:
00042     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00049     template<class Archive>
00050     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00051     {
00052         // If Archive is an output archive, then '&' resolves to '<<'
00053         // If Archive is an input archive, then '&' resolves to '>>'
00054         archive & boost::serialization::base_object<AbstractTissue<DIM> >(*this);
00055     }
00056 
00057 public:
00058 
00065     AbstractCellCentreBasedTissue(const std::vector<TissueCell>& rCells,
00066                                   const std::vector<unsigned> locationIndices=std::vector<unsigned>());
00067 
00072     AbstractCellCentreBasedTissue();
00073 
00082     c_vector<double, DIM> GetLocationOfCellCentre(TissueCell* pCell);
00083 
00091     Node<DIM>* GetNodeCorrespondingToCell(TissueCell* pCell);
00092 
00102     TissueCell* AddCell(TissueCell& rNewCell, c_vector<double,DIM> newLocation, TissueCell* pParentCell=NULL);
00103 
00111     bool IsCellAssociatedWithADeletedNode(TissueCell& rCell);
00112 
00119     virtual void UpdateNodeLocations(const std::vector< c_vector<double, DIM> >& rNodeForces, double dt);
00120 
00132     virtual double GetDampingConstant(unsigned nodeIndex);
00133 
00134 };
